entry.title: Address expiration times should be added to BIP-173
entry.summary: In a recent email exchange on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Andreas Schildbach pointed out that Coinbase, with its 15+ million users, had an expired payment protocol SSL certificate for several months. This raised concerns about the security of Coinbase's platform and their level of attention to detail. Despite some users supporting the platform, it doesn't necessarily mean that it's being widely used. The lack of communication from Coinbase regarding this issue has left some feeling uneasy.
